snippet: Professor Miller, who taught at the University of Virginia, wove the national debate over slavery into his books about Abraham Lincoln and John Quincy Adams.
abstract: Prof William Lee Miller, historian and Lincoln scholar known for his books about the roiling national debate over slavery, dies at age 86.
lead_paragraph: Professor Miller, who taught at the University of Virginia, wove the national debate over slavery into his books about Abraham Lincoln and John Quincy Adams.

headline.seo: William Lee Miller, Lincoln Scholar, Dies at 86
headline.main: William Lee Miller, Scholar on Abraham Lincoln, Is Dead at 86
headline.print_headline: William Lee Miller, Scholar On Lincoln, Is Dead at 86
